features.name: Authentication System
features.description: Complete auth system with JWT tokens, refresh tokens, Google OAuth, and NextAuth.js integration for session management

features.name: Class Booking System
features.description: Browse, view, and book surf classes with date/time selection, participant management, and guest checkout support

features.name: Reservation Management
features.description: Create, view, update, and cancel reservations with multi-tenant support and guest checkout functionality

features.name: Guest Checkout
features.description: Allows unauthenticated users to book classes, auto-creates user accounts, and sends welcome emails with credentials

features.name: Payment System
features.description: Payment processing with voucher uploads, Yape/Plin integration, discount codes, and admin verification

features.name: School Dashboard
features.description: School admin dashboard for managing classes, instructors, students, reservations, and payments

features.name: Instructor Dashboard
features.description: Instructor-specific views for managing their classes, schedules, and student interactions

features.name: Admin Dashboard
features.description: Super admin dashboard for managing all schools, users, and system-wide settings

features.name: Email Service
features.description: Email notifications for reservations, payments, password resets, and welcome emails using Resend API

features.name: Notification System
features.description: In-app notifications with real-time updates and notification center UI

features.name: Multi-Tenant System
features.description: School-based multi-tenancy with data isolation and role-based access control

features.name: Product Management
features.description: Manage and sell products (equipment, accessories) alongside class bookings

features.name: Beach/Location Management
features.description: Manage beach locations for surf classes with details and mapping

features.name: Image Upload System
features.description: Image upload and management with Cloudinary integration and local storage fallback

features.name: Home Page
features.description: Main landing page with hero section, class listings, instructor spotlight, and school showcase

features.name: Statistics Dashboard
features.description: Analytics and statistics for schools, reservations, and revenue
